movies.title: Pjevam danju, pjevam nocu
movies.plot: Zdravko Colic is the biggest pop star in Yugoslavia. We follow him during his "Traveling Earthquake Tour", learning who is the man behind the microphone, dancers, glittery suits... and in front of the audience.
movies.simplePlot: Zdravko Colic is the biggest pop star in Yugoslavia. We follow him during his "Traveling Earthquake Tour", learning who is the man behind the microphone, dancers, glittery suits... and in front of the audience.

biography.bio: Zdravko Colic was born on May 30, 1951 in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for The Hunting Party (2007), Pjevam danju, pjevam nocu (1979) and Formula 1 (1984).
biography.name: Zdravko Colic

biography.bio: Arsen Dedić was born on July 28, 1938 in Sibenik, Croatia, Yugoslavia. He was a composer and actor, known for Sve ce biti dobro (2008), Glembajevi (1988) and The Elm-Chanted Forest (1986). He was married to Gabi Novak. He died on August 17, 2015 in Zagreb, Croatia.
biography.name: Arsen Dedić

biography.bio: Kornell Kovach (Kornelije Kovac) was born in Nis, Yugoslavia. He comes from a prominent artistic family - his grandfather was a conductor, his father a music professor and a violinist, his mother a singer in the opera choir. Kornell Kovach received his early music education at his hometown's Subotica College Of Music, after which he entered The Academy Of Music Art in Sarajevo. He graduated from the Theory And Piano Department. Along with his classical music education, he was devoting a great deal of his time to the pop and rock music. His career as a professional musician started in 1961. Profoundly educated, he was able to exercise successfully in various fields of activities: as composer, pianist, keyboard player, producer and arranger. In 1961 he formed his first band, BKB, which became a prominent jazz trio at the time. In 1963 they entered The Yu Jazz Festival, that took place in Bled (Slovenia). After conducting the various orchestras in Bosnia, he finally joined Sarajevo's most popular pop band Indexi. With them he had a 2-months long tour in Russia. In 1968 he moved to the Yugoslav capital, Belgrade, where he founded one of the most significant Yugoslav pop-rock bands ever, Korny Group. As a composer and a musician, he won many music contests that took place in former Yugoslavia. With Korny Group he entered some music festivals in Europe. Kornell Kovach has been writing music for theater, movies and television. Like the composer of pop and rock music he has been greatly successful. His songs were released on numerous LP-s in Yugoslavia, Spain, France, USA, Holland, Sweden, Finland, Norway etc. Many of them were Golden or Platinum Records. Since 1979 Kornell Kovach has participated in many projects in Spain, as a producer, composer or arranger. He collaborated with various TV networks in Spain, such as: *TELE 5 - Music production of TELE 5 star singer THALIA /Mexico/ *ANTENA 3- Music director of the popular TV show "De Tu A Tu". Also, Kornell Kovach spent two years as the keyboard player of the popular Spanish "Caco Senante salsa-band".
biography.name: Kornelije Kovac

biography.bio: Kemal Monteno was born on September 17, 1948 in Sarajevo, Yugoslavia. He was an actor and composer, known for Jugovizija (1967), Jugovizija (1968) and Jugovizija (1974). He was married to Branka. He died on January 21, 2015 in Zagreb, Croatia.
biography.name: Kemal Monteno

biography.bio: Dusan Radovic was born on November 29, 1922 in Nis, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was a writer and actor, known for Na slovo, na slovo (1971), Kad sam bio mali (1964) and Lepa parada (1970). He died on August 16, 1984 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Dusan Radovic

biography.bio: Lokica Stefanovic was born on March 31, 1946 in Belgrade, Yugoslavia as Leposava. She is an actress, known for Pjevam danju, pjevam nocu (1979), Ulicom 7 mladih - I deo (2003) and Ulicom 7 mladih - II deo (2003).
biography.name: Lokica Stefanovic

biography.bio: Jelena Tinska studied classical ballet for 12 years, from the age of 5.Graduated in ballet school "Lujo Davico". Worked as a professional ballet, jazz and contemporary dancer in Yugoslavia in famous ballet groups; Ivanka Lukateli,Boris Radak, Petar Slaj,"Lokice", Lokica Stefanovic. Studied Drama at The Academy of Drama Arts in Beograd. Since 1979 has been working in Beograd in "Theatre Dusko Radovic" as an actress. Fluent in English, French and Serbian languages.
biography.name: Jelena Tinska
